p: The PCA applied on the stem essential oils showed that the extracts of July and August had a similar chemical compositions compared to the other samples in the first period. The stem samples of the three months in the second harvest period (January, February, and March) showed a constant chemical composition in general ( Figure 4d). The clustering suggested the occurrence of three clusters within the L. camara stems essential oils. Cluster 1 (F1) was clearly distinct from the other two.
